"Night Ride: District B":
"In the Las Vegas District B, on planet
Earth, we have detected a large enemy
group reading. Leaving it alone could
have adverse effects on the world.
Available ARKS are to rush to the site as
soon as possible, using the new mobile
weapon Rideroid, and subdue the enemies.
――――――――――――――――――――
Score is shared within the room.
Quest ends when time limit expires."

"We'll be transferring you shortly.
The area is Las Vegas, on planet
Earth. The purpose of this mission
is to subdue the Phantom creatures."

"ARKS have a newly developed
weapon, the Rideroid. Use it to
ride freely around Las Vegas
and defeat the enemies!"
